items.name: The Blood Dance
explicitMods: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
3% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
1% of Life Regenerated per Second per Frenzy Charge
29% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
6% increased Damage against Enemies on Low Life per Frenzy Charge
flavourText: To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Punctures the target, causing a bleeding debuff. While bleeding, they take damage over time based on how much damage was dealt in the initial hit. The bleeding deals more damage while they move. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.
explicitMods: Causes Bleeding on Hit for 5 seconds
Bleeding targets take 10% of the Physical Damage Dealt per second
Bleeding targets take an additional 50% of the Physical Damage Dealt per second while moving
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a charged arrow at the target, causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning which damages nearby enemies.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Hits up to 3 additional enemies near the target
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target. Creates a patch of ground ice under the target.
explicitMods: 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel fire through your hands, adding fire to your physical damage. If you kill an enemy with an attack, other enemies near them will be ignited for the overkill damage.
explicitMods: Gain 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel ice through your hands, adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, they explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Elemental Status Effects caused by supported Skills spread to other enemies

items.name: Morbid Visor
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel lightning through your hands, adding lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, lightning bolts will strike enemies around you for a short duration.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed targets will grant life and mana, and a chance to gain a power charge.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 27% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Cursed enemies have an additional 9% chance to receive a Critical Strike
Cursed enemies take 35% more extra damage from Critical Strikes
Cursed enemies grant 22 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 22 Mana when Killed

items.name: Wurm's Molt
explicitMods: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
flavourText: They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried
in every skin the great beasts shed.

explicitMods: Reforges a magic item with new random properties
items.descrText:
Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.
Shift click to unstack.

Shift click to unstack.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.
